Macros | Functions
TPIU - Trace Port Interface Unit
mcu » apollo330P

Detailed Description

Purpose: This module provides support functions for configuring and managing the Arm TPIU (Trace Port Interface Unit) module on Apollo5 devices. It enables debug trace functionality, SWO (Serial Wire Output) support, and trace data formatting for development and debugging applications.

Key Features

  1. Debug Trace: Support for Arm debug trace functionality.
  2. SWO Output: Serial Wire Output for debug data transmission.
  3. Trace Formatting: Configurable trace data formatting.
  4. Clock Configuration: Flexible clock source selection.
  5. Pin Protocol: Support for various pin protocols and modes.

Functionality

  • Configure TPIU module and trace parameters
  • Enable/disable debug trace functionality
  • Set up SWO output and data formatting
  • Configure clock sources and pin protocols
  • Handle trace data flow and formatting

Usage

  1. Configure TPIU using am_hal_tpiu_config()
  2. Enable TPIU with am_hal_tpiu_enable()
  3. Set up trace parameters and formatting
  4. Configure SWO output as needed
  5. Disable TPIU when no longer needed

Configuration

  • Clock Sources: Select TPIU clock sources
  • Trace Formatting: Configure trace data format
  • Pin Protocols: Set up pin protocols and modes
  • SWO Settings: Configure Serial Wire Output parameters

Function Documentation

◆ am_hal_tpiu_config()

uint32_t am_hal_tpiu_config ( uint32_t ui32DbgTpiuClksel,
uint32_t ui32FFCR,
uint32_t ui32CSPSR,
uint32_t ui32PinProtocol,
uint32_t ui32SWOscaler )

Configure the TPIU.

This function configures TPIU parameters. Since the TPIU is used by different peripherals such as ITM, DWT, PMU, etc., each user can call this function to configure for specific needs.

◆ am_hal_tpiu_disable()

uint32_t am_hal_tpiu_disable ( void )

Disables the TPIU.

This function disables the ARM TPIU by disabling the TPIU clock source in MCU control register.

◆ am_hal_tpiu_enable()

uint32_t am_hal_tpiu_enable ( uint32_t ui32DeprecatedSetItmBaud)

Enables the TPIU.

This function enables the ARM TPIU by setting the TPIU registers and then enabling the TPIU clock source in MCU control register.

Parameters
ui32SetItmBaud- Deprecated. Instead use am_hal_itm_parameters_set().
